definition: only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: Today, along with the advancement of globalization, it is pointless and makes no sense for countries to blame eath other.
sentences.chinese: 在經濟全球話的今天，國家間互相指責是無濟於事的。

sentences.english: There's very little point in protesting.
sentences.chinese: 反對也無濟於事，反對也沒有多大用。

sentences.english: Doing or stimulating things only in America will continue to do nothing.
sentences.chinese: 如果只是執行或是刺激某些事情，那將依舊無濟於事。

sentences.english: Threats of massive fines have gone unheeded.
sentences.chinese: 罰款的威脅也無濟於事。

sentences.english: Then I realize that guilt does nothing to get me fitter.
sentences.chinese: 之後我意識到對於使我的身材更有型，負疚無濟於事。

sentences.english: His best efforts, however, proved unavailing and the child died.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他所有的全力都無濟於事，女兒仍是死了。

sentences.english: No need to honk the horn under such a traffic block.
sentences.chinese: 在這種塞車的情況下，你再按喇叭也無濟於事。

sentences.english: Of course, simply the accusation Watermelon unethical to no avail.
sentences.chinese: 當然，單純的指責瓜農缺德無濟於事。

sentences.english: I have struggled in vain and can bear it no longer.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得掙扎無濟於事了，我不能再忍下去。

sentences.english: Ratings downgrades of assets guaranteed by Spain’s central bank didn’t help either.
sentences.chinese: 下調西班牙中央銀行擔保資產的評級也無濟於事。

sentences.english: We try to help, giving our time and soul, but it’s to no avail.
sentences.chinese: 我們試圖付出時間和靈魂來幫助，但一切都無濟於事。

sentences.english: The bank's much-vaunted security system failed completely.
sentences.chinese: 這家銀行大肆吹噓的保安設施完全無濟於事。

sentences.english: Hundreds of thousands of cars sit unsold, even at cut prices.
sentences.chinese: 數十萬輛車閒置未售，降價也無濟於事。

sentences.english: It's no use abusing fate, for it is a deaf.
sentences.chinese: 向命運叫罵無濟於事呢，因爲命運是個聾子。

sentences.english: But all the advisements went of no avail.
sentences.chinese: 可是所有勸告全都無濟於事。

sentences.english: His best efforts, however, proved unavailing and.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他所有的努力都無濟於事，女。

definition: to force someone to do something
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom)/all that has been achieved goes down the drain
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
to be of no interest to anyone (idiom)
